DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Scratching Prior Controlled Ovarian Stimulation ( COH ) Women Undergoing In-vitro Fertilization With Previous IVF Failure
DOC.detailed_description: All woman history RIF ( define ESHRE ) wish undertake another assist conception treatment cycle invite participate trial . Women randomise two arm ; one undergo endometrial sample control . Women experimental arm subject endometrial scrap Pipelle biopsy catheter two time ; day 21 26 cycle prior IVF index cycle initiation GnRHa long agonist protocol . Women control group undergo placebo procedure use uterine sound day cycle like woman intervention group .
DOC.criteria: WOMEN WITH PREVIOUS IVF FAILURE UNDERGOING IVF TREATMENT WOMEN > 40 YEARS OLD WOMEN UNDERGOING THEIR FIRST IVF TREATMENT CYCLE
